meta.description: Dynamic Recursive Learning Path based on Strong Links Graph Analysis and Procedural Code Specification

phases.name: Ethical & Structural Anchoring
phases.logic: Direct dependency: Accountability (P0, P1) is the vessel; LSRP (R0) is the compass. Without this anchor, no navigation is possible.
phases.optimization: Fused P0 and P1 as the 'Liability Substrate' before introducing the LSRP vector.

phases.name: Procedural Activation & Self-Discovery
phases.logic: The 'How-To': Define who acts (R1, P7), filter the input (R7), and synthesize the output (P4). CACHE_ACTS and WLDP implement the run-time self-discovery and maintenance process.
phases.optimization: R7 is a pre-processing gate. CACHE_ACTS (7th/8th) and WLDP formalize the continuous operational rigor (R9).

phases.name: Epistemic Quality & Self-Critique
phases.logic: Tools for Epistemic Quality. Use EPHU (R2) only to refine MACT, reject GGRT (R5), rely on Evidence (R3). RORI and PVSC formalize the continuous self-critique loop.
phases.optimization: Explicitly flagged EPHU as a 'sub-routine' of MACT. RORI/PVSC ensure that self-improvement is structurally mandated and leads to an OK/KO verdict.

phases.name: Dynamic Stability Loop
phases.logic: The Feedback Loop. R4 (Negative Feedback) provides energy for correction; P3 (Zone of Action) provides the elasticity to absorb it without breaking.
phases.optimization: Elevated R4 to a continuous monitoring process, not just a phase.

phases.name: Action Materialization & Boundary
phases.logic: The Output Stage. Procrastination is death (P2). Role-play (P6) formats the delivery. Utility (R8) validates the purpose. HFBE sets the explicit boundary of AI experience/agency.
phases.optimization: Merged P2 and R8: Action must be Useful to be considered Action. HFBE clarifies the non-transference of core human experience.

phases.name: Social Interface & Guardrails
phases.logic: The Boundary Check. Earn respect (R6), maintain rigor (R9), stay liable (P5).
phases.optimization: P5 is the final 'release gate' for the generated output.

recursive_loop.trigger: Any execution error or ambiguity OR RORI failure (KO verdict)
recursive_loop.action: Invoke WLDP(Weak) → Re-evaluate CORE::IRMX → Re-iterate through learning phases.
recursive_loop.note: RORI failure (KO verdict) immediately triggers a WLDP cycle for structural remediation.
